profile.name: Klea Merkuri
profile.title: Full Stack Engineer
profile.story: I’m an LA-based web developer and digital content creator who developed a genuine passion for coding when trying to automate Excel billing spreadsheets. I’m eager to bring my unique blend of analytical skills and coding enthusiasm to innovative projects to create intuitive and accessible software.
profile.lead: I bring ideas to life with robust, user-focused web solutions.
about: Hello! I'm Klea, a software engineer based in Los Angeles with a passion for creating dynamic, user-centric web applications. My journey into tech started from a background in Economics at UCLA, where I developed a keen eye for detail and a love for solving complex problems.

My experience at enterprise financial institutions has allowed me to hone my skills in migrating large-scale applications to modern headless architectures and building robust, scalable APIs. I thrive in collaborative environments, working alongside cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features.
